Literature.Title: A new group of antifungal and antibacterial lipopeptides derived from non-membrane active peptides conjugated to palmitic acid
Literature.Author: Avrahami D, Shai Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538P(MIC=>100µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6051(MIC=>100µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>100µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=>100µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>100µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=>100µM),Cryptococcus neoformans ATCC MYA-422(MIC=>100µM),Aspergillus fumigatus ATCC 26430(MIC=>100µM),Aspergillus flavus ATCC 9643(MIC=>100µM),Aspergillus niger ATCC 9642(MIC=>100µM)
